GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
iio: trigger: sysfs: fix use-after-free on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 4ef1e521be610b720daeb7cf899fedc7db0274c4, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit f38bc926d022ebd67baad6ac7fc22c95fbc6238c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iio: trigger: sysfs: fix use-after-free on remove
